name: LogicHouse
description:
Hello,

Thank you for visiting this page.

My name is Joy Ajayi and I am in my final year at Covenant University studying Computer Engineering.

For my final grade, I decided to develop a serious game called LogicHouse to introduce the possibility of Digital Game-based Learning in Engineering education in Nigeria.

LogicHouse, my game is a prototype that uses the concepts of Digital Electronics, a course in the Department of Electrical and Information Engineering, my department, as its major theme.

In this project, I utilise the Learning Mechanics- Game Mechanics framework as an analysis tool for the Game-based Learning assessment to determine if it passes the serious game test...loool.

Anyways, it is over to you. Let me know what you think of this game in the comment section and also in this google form : https://bit.ly/LogicHousefeed
